Master Enslave

Enslave:lose commander status
Will not be cast against small numbers of enemies:1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], No Effect on Mindless [mind], Affects Enemies Only [friendlyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic Resistance Negates Easily [mrnegateseasily])
The caster unleashes vast arcane powers, ripping the free will from his foes and turning them into loyal thralls. The thralls will aid the caster until they die. There is no way to break free once enslaved by this spell.
